tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,Surgical Tooth Extraction,
review:
After checking on the profile of all accomplished Dentists in Bhandup West , I opted for Dr.Vishakha because the reviews from other patients spoke very well about her treatment and also her clinic was very near to my house.
I am writing this review after more than a month of the treatment including two root canal , tooth extraction and a clean up  because I intended to write a genuine review based on my current comfort level with the treatment.
Honestly and without any bias I can state that the treatment has been very satisfying and I have no problem whatsoever with my daily routine  related to my tooth. I also went for Zirconia crown after the Root Canal Treatment and I am able to easily eat ,crunch, grind without any discomfort whatsoever.
I would surely recommend Dr.Vishakha because never did she influence me for any treatment and I went for the treatments wherever I was facing issues with. But she did explain me in detail on all my problem tooth.
The charges are also quite reasonable and the clinic is as it should be very neat clean and bright with all equipment's in place. 
A truly friendly and soft spoken polite Dentist Doctor whom I wish the very best of professional success and personal well being always.
A word a thanks and appreciation to Dr. Disha Mehta associate dentist to Dr.Vishakha who was also excellent in her knowledge , information on the problems and the partial treatment performed.
Please keep up the good work Dr.Vishakha.
Best Wishes.
reply_text:
Thank you so much Sir for your feedback. Really overwhelmed that you noticed and are appreciating each and everything we put in.
Means a lot to us!

tags: None
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Veneers, Crowns and Bridges,
review: Hi I have been petrified of dentists for the longest time. Be it the sound of drills or root canals or getting crowns. I recently got comprehensive dental treatment done at Dr Vishakhas dental clinic which included root canals, 2 crowns and cleaning and polishing.The whole ordeal was so smooth. The root canal was absolutely painless. Lasted Just 45 mins in the dental chair and I was up and walking. Pain free and happy! I neglected most of my dental problems and delayed it as I was scared of dentists but I can happily say I'm not scared anymore. If you too are lookin for dental treatment and are scared of dentist dr vishakhas dental clinic is the place for you! Shes a through professional calm and a true perfectionist. She explained me the entire procedure and only went ahead once I was convinced. The hygiene in the clinic is also top notch, something that made me comfortable to go and get treatment done especially during this pandemic. The staff is very courteous too. Thank you. 5 stars to you. Keep up the good work.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: on 23 Feb 2022 I started getting toothache and it was very painful. I was searching for doctors nearby and got know about Dr. Vishakha on practo app. So I went to check the reviews of the doctor and was satisfied so I visited to her clinic on 25 Feb 2022. Doctor was very friendly, patient and humble, she checked my tooth and  found it need a root canal, it was the last tooth of my jaw. I completed my treatment on 11 March 2022 and was satisfied with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your review Dipal sirüôè

review: I did my RCT with Vishakha doc and the same was done last year. She could explain the issue nicely and explained the treatment to be done nicely. The treatment was completed on time and was carried out diligently.  I would recommend her for any tooth related issues.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words Sir, We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Dental Hub for dental cleaning. Dr. Vishakha explained the problem clearly and skillfully treated it. She also gave an idea about what precautions one can take to avoid the same problem in the future.

I was very happy with Dr. Vishakha's politeness, friendliness and her skills in treating my tooth problems. I highly recommend her.
Thank you.

tags: None
review: As of today whatever filling doc has done got pulled off** * *** **** *** * **** ******* *** *** **** ** ******** sorry to say but it's truth whole filling came into my mouth i have evidence.. not happy with treatment ****** * ***** *** **** **** ***** ** **** **** ** **** *** **** *** ** hallirious i have pics if u need
reply_text:
A restoration getting dislodged is something that's unfortunate and highly unlikely. 

That being said sometimes a filling does get dislodged. 

As spoken over the phone we are more than willing to re - do the filling. 

Incase theres a problem, we always have a solution to it.
Moving forward we request you to come in and get the dislodged filling re-done. 

Thank you.
